hotels.title: Modern Downtown Austin Mid-Century Stay with Restaurant, Bar & Coffee Shop
hotels.description: Enjoy being steps from Austin's lively 6th Street Entertainment District with a relaxing stay at this refreshed retreat in the heart of the city's Downtown. Before you set out for the day, grab a quick coffee and buttery pastry at President's House Coffee. Between Texan adventures, take a dip in the hotel's sparkling rooftop pool, sip margaritas while overlooking the skyline at Cloud Bar, or sit down to enjoy casual eats at Capital A.
